articles.title: Sanjay Manjrekar Picks His India XI For 1st ODI vs South Africa, Leaves Out Veterans Shikhar Dhawan .. - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: South Africa vs India: Former India cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar had a couple of surprise inclusions in his probable Team India XI for the first ODI against South Africa scheduled to be played at Boland Park in Paarl on Wednesday.
articles.content: Ex-India player Sanjay Manjrekar named his probable starting Team India XI which had a couple of surprise inclusions. The first ODI against South Africa is scheduled to be played at the Boland Park i… [+1600 chars]

articles.title: Watch: How Unmukt Chand Fared On Historic BBL Debut For Melbourne Renegades - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: Unmukt Chand walked out to bat at No.4 after Shaun Marsh was dismissed for a well-made 51 off 38 balls. The Renegades, chasing 183, needed 45 more runs to win in 5.1overs with 8 wickets in their bank.
articles.content: India's 2012 U19 World Cup-winning captain Unmukt Chand's Big Bash League (BBL) debut did not prove to be a memorable one. The talented right-handed batter, who became the first male Indian cricketer… [+1525 chars]
